description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows Kernel elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-26178):

1. Download and apply the relevant KB update corresponding to your Windows version from the official Microsoft Update Catalog.
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2 (x64): KB5035853 - [Download Here](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035853)
   - For Windows 10 (x64): KB5035858 - [Download Here](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035858)

2. Restart your system after the installation to ensure that the updates take effect.

**Details**:
- This update resolves a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the Windows kernel, mitigating potential elevation of privilege attacks.
- Ensure that your system matches one of the specified build numbers for compatibility with the updates.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the installation to prevent any loss during the update process.
